* BrightBlade looked up at Gangon as he hung from the tree(or so I hope, 
Code forgot to post the name with the message so I'm taking a wild guess.), 
she had to twist her head slightly to get some what of a straight view of 
him.
She then shook her head then went back to leaning against the tree, she 
looked at the grapes but then pushed them aside.*

" Whatever."

* BrightBlade was beginning to get board, with Gangon doing absolutely 
nothing that interested her and herself just sitting there it was a bit 
obvious.
She looked off in the distance but then thought that she had better move and 
do something before she turned into a bump on a log, she got to her feet and 
brushed herself off.
Slag! She was dirty!
BrightBlade scanned around and suddenly located just what she needed, a 
fresh water creek! She smiled to herself and then began to move slowly away 
from the tree and Gangon, she was in much need of a bath!
The creek wasn't to far away from the tree in which Gangon hung, in the same 
clearing and in clear sight of each spot.
She stuck a foot in and then pulled it back, it was COLD!
BrightBlade then thought about how dirty she felt and just plain waded in, 
she clenched her teeth as she wadded in to about waist height.
It was a good time to be thankful that her circuits were waterproof!*
